headline: The Bull Case For 3M (MMM) Could Change Following Expanded PFAS RICO Class Action Ruling – Learn Why
summary: On January 6, 2026, a Montana federal judge refused to dismiss a class-action lawsuit alleging 3M and other manufacturers concealed PFAS-related health risks in firefighter turnout gear, allowing wide-ranging claims, including RICO, to proceed. This ruling raises the prospect of substantial PFAS-related liabilities for 3M, as municipalities seek reimbursement for premature replacement of firefighter gear used by more than one million personnel.
